summary: The Financial Audit Manual (FAM) presents a methodology for performing financial statement audits of federal entities in accordance with professional standards. It is a tool for enhancing accountability over taxpayer-provided resources. This May 2023 update replaces Financial Audit Manual, Volume 1 (June 2022 version) and contains the audit methodology. The FAM also consists of: Volume 2 : detailed implementation guidance Volume 3 : the Federal...
title: Financial Audit Manual: Volume 1, June 2022 (Updated May 2023)
